sentences.sContent: So, ask businesses on both sides of the Atlantic, why have two lots of tests where one would do?
sentences.sContent_eng: So, ask businesses on both sides of the Atlantic, why have two lots of tests where one would do?
sentences.sCn: 因此，大西洋两岸的企业都在问，当一套测试可以解决问题时，为什么需要两套呢？

sentences.sContent: From there, the track continued through the Atlantic south toward Africa, but it was unlikely the satellite got that far if it started falling over the Pacific.
sentences.sContent_eng: From there, the track continued through the Atlantic south toward Africa, but it was unlikely the satellite got that far if it started falling over the Pacific.
sentences.sCn: 从那里，轨迹继续穿过大西洋向南飞向非洲，但如果卫星在太平洋上空开始坠落，它不太可能飞行如此远。

phrases.pCn: 大西洋城（美国新泽西州东南部）
北大西洋公约组织（等于NATO）
英国维珍大西洋航空公司
